DIRECTOR OF APPLICATIONS
Profile
Accomplished Healthcare Professional with an exemplary background in Healthcare IT. Progressive leadership experience in Healthcare IT.
Proven ability in strategic planning, business requirements gathering, creating roadmap with short term and long term goals, budget estimation and
management, negotiation, return on investment and return on value analysis. Proactive leader with an excellent work ethic and commitment to
exceptional customer service.
